title: 6 maps predicting snowfall totals from Sunday’s coastal winter storm

title: Meet the 9-year-old Massachusetts kid reporter heading to the Super Bowl
author: Annie Jonas
bullets: Local News Louis Divito, of Westminster, was named Panini America’s 2026 Super Bowl Kid Reporter, and is headed to California.
Louis Divito, 9, was named Panini America’s 2026 Super Bowl Kid Reporter, earning him an all-access pass to Super Bowl LX in Santa Clara, Calif.
(Photo courtesy of John Divito) By Annie Jonas January 30, 2026 | 8:02 AM 3 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Patriots will have a ‘road warrior’ for Super Bowl LX in defensive coordinator Terrell Williams
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "He deserves the victory for this upcoming match.
So we're looking forward to getting that for him.
" Terrell Williams will make the trek to Santa Clara with the Patriots.

title: Man found guilty of manslaughter for fatal sword stabbing in Falmouth
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Local News James Blood, 43, was sentenced to 18 to 20 years in state prison and 3 years of probation.
A man was convicted of manslaughter Thursday in Barnstable Superior Court after a fatal sword stabbing in 2022, prosecutors said.

James Blood, 43, was found guilty of manslaughter and entering at night for felony placing a person in fear, the office of Cape & Islands District Attorney Robert Galibois said in a press releaseOn October 24, 2022, Blood entered the victim’s home in Falmouth.

title: Can shoveling snow trigger heart attacks? Here’s what Boston’s cardiologists had to say
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Health Half a dozen cardiologists weighed in on why shoveling can trigger heart attacks and how to stay safe.
The strain of shoveling snow can trigger heart attacks, cardiologists say.

title: Rob Parker: Tom Brady shouldn’t be in the Pro Football Hall of Fame
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "Tom Brady is best described as Lance Armstrong without the bicycle.
" Tom Brady and Bill Belichick won six Super Bowls together in New England.
Jim Davis / The Boston Globe Much of the sports world has been up in arms after Bill Belichick was reportedly snubbed in his first year on the Pro Football Hall of Fame ballot.

title: Activist Monica Cannon-Grant sentenced to probation, home confinement for slew of fraud charges
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The former CEO of the Violence in Boston nonprofit was sentenced Thursday after pleading guilty in September 2025.
Monica Cannon-Grant was sentenced Thursday to four years of probation and six months of home detention.
